text: And, you know, listen, all these guys have been pitching all their lives, you know, high leverage games, whatever.

speaker: SPEAKER_18

text: He's fully healthy.
speaker: SPEAKER_18

text: And I just go back to what I said a minute ago, is that when you try to, for lack of a better term, it's not the perfect term, but when you try to play God with these situations, it never works out.
speaker: SPEAKER_18

text: and these guys are highly trained athletes.
speaker: SPEAKER_18

text: He's young.
speaker: SPEAKER_18

text: His body is used to it.
speaker: SPEAKER_18

text: And again, I think when you start playing God with stuff, that's when injuries start to happen when you're in that start-stop mindset more than anything else.
